items.name: Copper Key
items.description: A tarnished key that still carries a metallic tang.

look.text: The diner door is boarded shut, but the lock remains.
look.failure_text: The boards look weathered but stubborn.

use.text: The boards won't budge without some leverage.
use.success_text: The copper key snaps the old padlock. You pry the door slightly ajar.

talk.text: You whisper reassurances to the empty doorway.

look.text: The dumpster reeks of rot and chemicals.
look.success_text: You sift through the grime and retrieve a copper key.

use.text: You've already taken what you need from the trash.

look.text: 'Welcome to Quiet Falls' now sports hastily scratched warnings.
look.failure_text: The letters flicker in your flashlight beam.

talk.text: You salute the sign. It remains stoic.
